Photo by Jeremy Thomas

My name is João.
I'm a PhD student at the Institute of Astrophysics and Space Sciences, in Porto.
I work on exoplanet detection using the radial velocity method, and I love statistics and computers.
Check out some of the cool stuff I've been doing and feel free to drop me a line.

Research

I find planets outside the Solar System.
